name: Cyber Hero Codex
description:
Travel though cyber space and save mankind with Codex and delwolf by stopping the rouge cyberhero that are controlled by a great evil. 

jump around with the rabbit power of codex.

blast your though the game with the power of delwolf

#controls-

keyboard and mouse-

wasd- move player 

mouse - move camera

E- interact

space - jump ( hit or hold space to double jump with codex)

click - punch or shoot if your Delwolf

Esc -  pause

GamePad-

left joystick- move player 

right joystick - move camera

X- interact

 A- jump ( hit or hold space to double jump with codex)

B - punch or shoot if your delwolf.

Start- Pause

(this is my first game i ever made and  hope you guys enjoy the game and the over all cyber hero series.)
